dcterms:creator: Vassileios Balntas
Karel Lenc
Andrea Vedaldi
Krystian Mikolajczyk
dcterms:description: The HPatches dataset contains local patches of higher diversity, is more realistic, and during evaluation the performance is measured on three tasks: verification, retrieval, and matching.
dcterms:title: HPatches Dataset

dcterms:creator: Simon Winder
Matthew Brown
dcterms:description: The Phototourism dataset contains three sets of patches, namely, Liberty, Notredame, and Yosemite. Additionally, labels are provided to indicate the 3D point that the patch corresponds to, thereby providing supervision.
dcterms:title: Phototourism Dataset
